entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Becoming clear this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
